description: This delicious rich and creamy cauliflower cheese soup is a meal in itself, made extra silky with butter beans blended in.
name: Cauliflower Cheese Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.2 cups vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter and oil in a large, deep pan and cook the leeks for 4-5 minutes until soft. Add the cauliflower, butter beans, mustard and vegetable stock and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes with the lid on until the cauliflower has softened. Add the milk and cheddar and simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Remove from the heat. Add the cream and blend with an immersion blender until smooth.
